Sentencas: Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (RSOFC) can perform both power production and electricity storage with high efficiency and reduced cost using the same device for both functions.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: Within the frame of a small scale application and distributed generation, RSOFC systems operate connected to the grid switching from electrolysis to fuel cell and vice versa
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: depending on load and grid peculiarities.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: The study aims to investigate the behavior of RSOFC in the two operation modes and in the transition phase.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: The analysis moves from the thermal equilibrium and electrical performances data gathered during the test of a six cells SOFC short stack.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: In particular, the effect of gas composition was deeply investigated.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: A mapping of performances was realized through polarization curves.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: Dilution of reactants, both in SOFC and SOE brings to reduction in performances while different compositions during SOE-SOFC transition did not give any significant effect to stack voltages.
Titulo: Study of SOFC-SOE transition on a RSOFC stack

Sentencas: The dynamic model was derived from experimental results; thermal and electrical transient response to current variation was determined under several operating conditions and related transfer functions were identified characterizing the device dynamic behavior.
